name: Edwin
text: Tried to call in a pickup order and was hung up on twice after holding on the line for 15 minutes! Finally went into the location, waited another 10 minutes to order,  finally ordered and waited another 20 minutes. Pizza Hut better be glad I love their product BUT I won't be going back to this location.

name: Jessica Pillai
text: Got the crust flavor wrong and when asked to fix it, while still in the store, the manager accused me of touching the pizza and said most places won't take it back if you touch it. However, when I asked if I noticed it was wrong once I took …More

name: Kevin Clay
text: I've been a loyal customer to this specific pizza hut for about 4 years now and I'm starting regret every bit of it! The employees are rude as hell and they keep constantly messing my orders up. Last night I ordered a personal pan pizza, …More
